mapper.insert: insert into payment (p_uid, id, p_point, p_amount, p_realamount, p_regdate, p_method, p_c_name, p_c_num, p_c_quota, p_remains, p_at, P_RECEIPT, p_c_apply) values (#{p_uid}, #{id}, #{p_point}, #{p_amount}, #{p_realamount}, sysdate, #{p_method}, #{p_c_name}, #{p_c_num}, #{p_c_quota}, #{p_remains}, #{p_at}, #{p_receipt}, #{p_c_apply})
insert into "ORDER"(O_NUM, L_NUM, P_UID, O_AMOUNT) values (order_seq.nextval,#{l_num},#{p_uid},#{o_amount})
mapper.select: select P.p_uid,P.p_point, P.p_amount, P.p_realamount, P.p_regdate, P.p_method, P.p_c_name, P.p_c_num, P.p_c_quota, P.p_remains, P.P_RECEIPT, P.p_c_apply, O.O_NUM, O.L_NUM, O.O_AMOUNT FROM payment P left join "ORDER" O on P.p_uid = O.P_UID where P.p_uid=#{p_uid}
